DOC.brief_summary: Based hypothesis orally administer GOS ferment SCFA pattern high acetate lead beneficial effect human substrate energy metabolism , aim address follow primary objective : To investigate effect 12-week supplementation GOS peripheral insulin sensitivity body weight control obese adult impair glucose homeostasis .
DOC.criteria: Overweight/obese ( BMI ≥ 28 kg/m2 < 40 kg/m2 ) insulin impair men postmenopausal woman impair glucose tolerance ( IGT : 2h plasma glucose 75g OGTT 7.811.1 mmol/l ) and/or impair fast glucose ( plasma glucose ≥ 5.6 mmol/l ) age 4570 year include study . In addition , subject weightstable least 3 month prior participation ( change bodyweight , i.e . < 3kg ) . diabetes mellitus gastroenterological disease major abdominal surgery ( allow i.e . : appendectomy , cholecystectomy ) lactose intolerance digestive disorder cardiovascular disease , cancer , liver kidney malfunction ( determine base ALAT creatinine level , respectively ) disease life expectancy short 5 year abuse product ( alcohol consumption > 15 units/week , drug ) excessive nicotine use define > 20 cigarette per day
